question: 怪談
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>discuss</kanji> the <kanji>suspicious</kanji> you're talking about something that may or may not be real. One of those things you could be discussing is a <vocabulary>ghost story</vocabulary>... you know that one with the hook?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
